file_content.text: Operational update: primary fleet air strikes will commence shortly.
Please standby.
My weapons officer confirmed your targeting tags and the eliminated air defenses. Mission accomplished... as expected, of course.
I assume you'll commence air strikes.
Now what?
I will give the order within the hour.
My pleasure.
If you want to see real pleasure on this face, speak to me once air strikes have resumed.
The Republic's defenses are down, but they won't stay that way.
Don't waste any time.
I am aware of that. I will give the order to commence air strikes within the hour.
Your reputation is well-deserved. Good fortune to you.
Awaiting confirmation of completed objectives: elimination of Republic air defenses and coordinate tagging of enemy targets.
Identifying... subject match. You are expected. Please standby for secure communique.
Ah... my lord. I've been waiting for your arrival. Admiral Hestun, sector fleet command.
Ah, Major. Admiral Hestun, sector fleet command. I hear you coordinated the air strike on Aegis Base.
Ah, Lieutenant. Admiral Hestun, sector fleet command. I hear you coordinated the air strike on Aegis Base.
Ah, I've been waiting for this opportunity. Admiral Hestun, sector fleet command.
Our bombing campaign over Coronet City has been paying dividends, but we've hit a snag near the capitol--Republic air defenses. I need your talents.
An Imperial fleet does not abort its campaign because of a few air defenses.
You must not halt operations.
Agreed, my lord. But until these defenses are dealt with, my hand is forced.
Surely a few air defenses are no match for an Imperial bombardment fleet.
An inconvenience, little more.
Unfortunately, my lord, it all depends on the nature of the campaign.
My "talents" are a valued commodity. And by that I mean expensive.
As long as you can afford me.
I'm not a fool, hunter. I've worked with your kind before.
So you know my work. How can I help, Admiral?
My reputation precedes me.
I will help any way I can.
Such dedication is a rarity.
You have an entire fleet at your disposal. Use it.
Your problem, not mine.
I'm afraid my fleet is at an impasse until the Republic's defenses are dealt with.
The Republic has anti-air guns all over Capitol Square. Tucked among the buildings, the alleys... the clever louts have made targeted strikes impossible.
Someone fearsome must crush their defenses. Those guns are their last lifeline. They'll fight like cornered beasts.
Say no more. Those air defenses will soon be a bad memory.
I'll take care of it.
Excellent, but... there is more. The Emperor doesn't want the Corellian government accidentally blasted to rubble.
Sounds like a risky target zone even without the air defenses.
What about collateral damage?
It is. And the Dark Council will not tolerate damage to the Corellian Legislature or any related government apparatus. They have... plans.
Fine, but let's make it quick.
I'm afraid there's more. The Emperor's plans for the Corellian government do not include seeing it accidentally blasted to rubble.
Absolute precision is the key. To that end, you must find any Republic or Green Jedi targets in the area and tag their coordinates.
Once the anti-air defenses are destroyed and the targets tagged, we can strike with surgical precision.
The Empire's bombs will fall again soon, admiral. And the Republic will see what real strength is.
Leave it to me.
That will be a most satisfying lesson to teach, my lord.
More than acceptable, admiral. Your bombs will soon be excising this Republic filth from Capitol Square.
Leave it to me.
I expected no less, my lord. Thank you.
Have my credits ready, admiral. I'll take care of this in no time.
Leave it to me.
Your compensation will be waiting for you.
Let's get your fleet back to bombing the enemy, admiral.
Leave it to me.
Excellent.
I'll try to get to it.
I see. Well, I can only hope your schedule cooperates.
An admiral who can't manage his own bombing campaign isn't worth the rank. But I find the cause worthy.
You're lucky I'm forgiving.
I see... In any case, your cooperation is appreciated.
The droid will provide the tagging unit. Good fortune, and long live the Emperor.
Transmission terminated. Coordinate tagging unit issued. Goodbye.
Systems unavailable. Awaiting incoming transmission.
